"Meri is tending to the grave. She describes how until now, she and her brothers have been working hard to carry on Rysas' work, but their clashing views on how to proceed led them down the wrong path. Into the midst of all this came <%me> and the others. Thanks to them, the siblings are all united as one. Now, she says, it's their turn to help."
